p: The authors have coined the phrase Renters’ Climate Inequities (RCI) to encompass the social, environmental, and economic justice considerations that renters face when it comes to climate change impacts; however, we note that there is a need for additional vocabulary to be developed that directly addresses the plight of the rental population faced with climate change impacts. The literature reveals that renters are an under-studied (and largely overlooked) population with respect to climate impacts, and development of appropriate terminology could serve to focus additional research on this group.
